releaseNotes: Major UI Overhaul: Redesigned interface with a cleaner, more professional layout and a new bottom navigation bar.
Multi-Language Support: Added a language switcher for English and Indonesian in the header.
New 'Performance' & 'Network' Tabs: Reorganized tweaks into dedicated sections for easier access and better logic.
Real-time Network Monitoring: The new 'Network' tab includes a live ping tester to monitor latency.
Enhanced Safety: Removed potentially risky tweaks (e.g., Disable Thermal Throttling) to ensure device safety.
Streamlined Interface: Moved 'Custom Module/Command' from the main tab to a settings modal for a cleaner look.
Improved Download Visuals: Replaced the old progress bar with a new circular progress indicator for downloads.
